Cooley Looked toward WinLord and his eyes seemed Bloodshot. "I have felt better." As he turned to WinLord the damage was highly Visable. His Bio Matrics were shot. His spark seems to be showing a little bit and he is losing alot of a reddish substance. His eyes however don't look Robotic though they look almost Human.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:

Windlord ran and started to check his friend "COoley... Are you all 
right??? tell me something!!!!"
